form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: MEDICAL Examination of Applicants for United States Visas, 5017-102

full_text: T Screened by NARA, 9/25/2023 See Shen Yu Ling IR5&1 Drs. Ander PLACE 501, Pr. one MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS Burding FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION Hong Kong. 3/31/1987 CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at Hong Kong BCC NAME AGE SEX I certify that on the above date I examined Shen Shi Ying 5/13/1913 74 F WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON C.I.No. B787464 Hong Kong 12/15/1982 I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Sypnilis, infectious stage Granuloma inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Insanity Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2)) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class-A, B, or C--diagnosis, and pertinent details*): EK 719 : Normal (Unfolding of aorta noted.) ) Chest X-ray report W. F. Watson from Dr. VDRL : Negative W. F. Watson Blood serological report from Dr. Other special report(s) (when needed) from Dr. W. F. Watson L.R.C.P.&S D. (Ohs) R.O.O.C. SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL TECHNICAL ADVISOB houre DAILE Air terson & DATE OF FINAL REPORT 501 Predical Examiner 4/2/1987 50157-102 Continue on reverse side if necessary.
